meta.note: Category metadata (icon, color, display name) for productions
Creative productions (comics, games, audio dramas, videos)
Junction table linking productions to credited people
Studio gear categories (DAW, Plugins, Microphones, etc.)
Support platforms for Ko-Fi, Patreon, etc.
Tech showcase items — lab photos, video embeds, write-ups
Tech stack items grouped by category
Can manual enter if you want. Doesn't have to be exact as not used in time calc.
What main section does this post belong to?
URL-safe identifier, matches the value stored on kjov2_productions.category
Human-readable category name shown in the UI
Iconify icon identifier (e.g. mdi:video). Used by frontend only.
Hex color for category badge in the UI
This will be the default sorted field on the site weighed against Display Order field if two years are the same.
For icon context, use https://icon-sets.iconify.design/ to reference the definition
This is where you can add a custom discriptor such as "Late 2020s"
Background used on "Latest Projects" section background, but also for backgrounds in modals where necessary
Must be defined for share links
Check to use this image as a featured video on homepage if applicable.
End year for multi-year productions (leave empty for single-year)
What the creator did (list of responsibilities)
Full URL to the video (YouTube, Vimeo)
Type of embed determines how the URL is parsed
Custom thumbnail (optional, falls back to platform thumbnail)
